events.message: I ordered a set of headphones last week, but I want to return them because they don't meet my expectations and I need a refund.
The system has classified this issue as Refund based on keywords mentioned in the customer's message.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service representative who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the headphones you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. I want to return the headphones because the sound quality is not as good as described.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the headphones.
I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label. This solution works well for me, thank you.
Your refund request has been processed and the shipping label was sent to your email. Please return the product within 14 days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the shipping label and if you need any further assistance with your return.
We are closing this case now as the return process is underway. Feel free to contact us if you have any more questions.
